simple.sql
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  simple.sql.Database

public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

This class attempts to simplify connections while keeping full control of what's happening.
Created: Sep 1, 2004

Author:
Kenneth Pierce

Constructor Detail

Database

public Database(int type,
                java.lang.String url,
                java.lang.String schema,
                java.lang.String catalog,
                java.lang.String user,
                java.lang.String password)
         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                java.sql.SQLException
This constructor is tailored to be used with some kind of login screen.

Parameters:
type - One of CON_*
url - Usually the IP/hostname and the port
schema - DBMS dependant
catalog - DBMS dependant
user - Username
password - Password
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the needed driver cannot be found.
java.sql.SQLException - If the actuall connection fails.

Database

public Database(int type,
                java.lang.String driver,
                java.lang.String url,
                java.lang.String schema,
                java.lang.String catalog,
                java.lang.String user,
                java.lang.String password)
         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                java.sql.SQLException
Parameters:
type - One of CON_*
driver - The package.package.class location of the driver.
url - Usually IP/hostname and port number
schema - DBMS dependant
catalog - DBMS dependant
user - Username
password - Password
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the driver was not found.
java.sql.SQLException - If the connection fails.

Database

public Database(java.lang.String driver,
                java.lang.String url,
                java.lang.String user,
                java.lang.String password)
         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                java.sql.SQLException
One of the two more advanced constructors.

Parameters:
driver - The package.package.class location of the driver.
url - Driver dependant.
user - Username
password - Password
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the driver was not found.
java.sql.SQLException - If the connection fails.

Database

public Database(java.lang.String driver,
                java.lang.String url,
                java.util.Properties props)
         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                java.sql.SQLException
Second of the two more advanced constructors.

Parameters:
driver - The package.package.class location of the driver.
url - Location of the database. Format is driver dependant.
props - Driver dependant properties used to define the connection.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the driver was not found.
java.sql.SQLException - If the connection failed.
